item.title: A Brief History Of Money
item.description: The Earth provides us with everything we need to grow food, develop tools, make shelters and live our lives. It does so in the form of natural resources. However, these resources are not distributed uniformly and are limited in quantity. Numerous wars were fought in history to gain access to these resources. Trading is something that developed as an alternative to war overtime. Trading involved the exchange of resources in a dynamic, such that the participants from a region offered a resource that their region was rich in, in exchange for sparse resources.
